long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your one stop place for all the major Indian Newspapers.
Breaking News, Headlines, World, Business, Cricket, Sports, Technology, Bollywood, etc..
Indian Newspapers extension brings to you list of all major websites handpicked and integrated right on your chrome and available with a click.

The list of sites include:
